committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to expand the boundaries of the Fredericksburg and Spotsylvania County Battlefields Memorial National Military Park, Virginia.

summary.text: Amends the Fredericksburg and Spotsylvania County Battlefields Memorial National Military Park Expansion Act of 1989 to expand the boundaries of the Fredericksburg and Spotsylvania County Battlefields Memorial National Military Park in Virginia to include specified lands donated to the Secretary of the Interior. (Current law authorizes acquisition of lands for the Park by donation, purchase with appropriated or donated funds, or exchange.) Expands the boundaries of the Appomattox Court House National Historical Park in Virginia to include specified donated lands. (Currently, lands may be acquired by the Secretary for the Park through donation, purchase with appropriated or donated funds, or exchange.)

titles.title: A bill to expand the boundaries of the Fredericksburg and Spotsylvania County Battlefields Memorial National Military Park, Virginia.
